testsuite.name: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage without outcome URL

testcase.name: Given I set up the LTI consumer key and shared secret if not already done
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage without outcome URL

testcase.name: When I launch random "basic-lti-launch-request" LTI request with role "Administrator" and outcome URL "" and document target "window"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage without outcome URL

testcase.name: Then I am on the LTI Mapping Page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage without outcome URL

testcase.name: When I click the 'System Homepage' mapping button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage without outcome URL

testcase.name: Then I am on the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage without outcome URL

testcase.name: And I close the LTI Test Harness leftover windows
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage without outcome URL

testcase.name: When I re-launch "basic-lti-launch-request" LTI request with role "Administrator" and outcome URL "" and document target "window"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage without outcome URL

testcase.name: Then I am on the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage without outcome URL

testcase.name: And I close the LTI Test Harness leftover windows
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage without outcome URL

testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage without outcome URL

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage with outcome URL ?[90m# lti/LTIMapping.feature:6?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI launch random "?[0m?[32m?[1mbasic-lti-launch-request?[0m?[32m" LTI request with role "?[0m?[32m?[1mAdministrator?[0m?[32m" and outcome URL "?[0m?[32m?[1mdefault?[0m?[32m" and document target "?[0m?[32m?[1mwindow?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# TestHarnessSteps.runLtiRequest(String,String,String,String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the LTI Mapping Page?[0m ?[90m# LTIMappingSteps.assertLtiMappingPage()?[0m # Map to System Homepage ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click the 'System Homepage' mapping button?[0m ?[90m# LTIMappingSteps.clickSystemHomepageButton()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI accept the LTI Mapping Page confirm dialog?[0m ?[90m# LTIMappingSteps.acceptConfirmDialog()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the System Homepage?[0m ?[90m# SystemHomepageSteps.assertSystemHomepage()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI close the LTI Test Harness leftover windows?[0m ?[90m# TestHarnessSteps.closeLeftoverWindows()?[0m # Resend the same values to ensure we are now taken directly to System Homepage ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI re-launch "?[0m?[32m?[1mbasic-lti-launch-request?[0m?[32m" LTI request with role "?[0m?[32m?[1mAdministrator?[0m?[32m" and outcome URL "?[0m?[32m?[1mdefault?[0m?[32m" and document target "?[0m?[32m?[1mwindow?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# TestHarnessSteps.reRunLtiRequest(String,String,String,String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the System Homepage?[0m ?[90m# SystemHomepageSteps.assertSystemHomepage()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI close the LTI Test Harness leftover windows?[0m ?[90m# TestHarnessSteps.closeLeftoverWindows()?[0m
